publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-3582.1 Charlie Gordon: Go4SET—As an amendment to motion (S3M-3582) in the name of John Park, insert at end "and notes that the overall winner of the West of Scotland heat was an all-girl team from King’s Park Secondary School in Glasgow". Supported by: Sarah Boyack*, Jamie McGrigor*, Johann Lamont*, Mary Mulligan*, Claire Baker*, Jackie Baillie*, Ken Macintosh* Motions and amendments which have attracted additional support

S3M-3582.1 Charlie Gordon: Go4SET—As an amendment to motion (S3M-3582) in the name of John Park, insert at end "and notes that the overall winner of the West of Scotland heat was an all-girl team from King’s Park Secondary School in Glasgow". Supported by: Sarah Boyack, Jamie McGrigor, Johann Lamont, Mary Mulligan, Claire Baker, Jackie Baillie, Ken Macintosh, John Park*, Stuart McMillan*, Trish Godman*, Des McNulty*, David Whitton*, Mr Frank McAveety*, Bill Kidd*
S3M-3582.1 Go4SET (lodged on 5 March 2009) Karen Whitefield*
